name: omggawd
body:
(c) Greg Toombs 2013 (should I really put my name on this?)
***

## New Relic installation
server-level (see newrelic.sh)

## Build dependencies
```
Ubuntu (only tested on Ubuntu 13.04)
gcc
-lcurl         = libcurl4-openssl-dev
-ljson         = libjson0-dev
-lpgapack-mpi1 = libpgapack-mpi1
-lmpi          = libopenmpi-dev
(see install-deps.sh)
```

## Runtime dependencies
* a browser
* an internet connection

## The important things what you should do
```
  sudo ./install-deps.sh
  
  cd stompy
  make
  cd ..
  
  make
  ./main-r
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
